TimeSensitiveLogic.BetExpiration: Bets expire if not resolved within BET_EXPIRATION_BLOCKS
TimeSensitiveLogic.TicketValidity: Ticket is checked against block.number to ensure it's within the allowed range

ConditionalLogicPaths.ResultDetermination: play function differentiates outcome paths based on maskRes and jackpotRes
ConditionalLogicPaths.RefundCondition: refund function enables refunds for expired bets only
ConditionalLogicPaths.DonationValidation: withdrawDonation checks if donation amount is available before withdrawal
